concept.title: About Experiences
concept.shortdesc: An experience, sometimes called a recipe, defines the content that displays in an mbox.

conbody.p: An experience determines which offer displays in a certain mbox when specific targeting conditions are met. For example, the experience determines that, when a visitor visits your site from Utah, an offer for two-day shipping appears in an mbox at the top of the page.

The experience also determines that, when a visitor is located in England, an offer relevant to that visitor appears in the same mbox. By carefully planned targeting of experiences, you can make sure that your site visitors see the most relevant offers, improving your chances of a successful visit.
